CustomField.formula:
HYPERLINK( Event__r.Community_Base_URL__c &
IF($Setup.Summit_Events_Settings__c.Managed_Package__c,'summit__', '')
& "SummitEventsAddToCalendar?instanceID="
& CASESAFEID(Event_Instance__r.Id)
& "&type=outlookweb",
"Add to Outlook Web Calendar")
CustomField.label: Add To Outlook Web Calendar
